messages.content: You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the full title of the document?
The Lorebook of the Suryanagar Cipher: Part 1 of 3.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What does this document serve as a record for?
The events, individuals, and histories related to the pursuit of the "Ashoka Manuscript Cache."<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the "Ashoka Manuscript Cache"?
A collection of knowledge believed to have been lost for over two millennia.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
In what fictional city is the story primarily set?
The North Indian metropolis of Suryanagar.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the genre of the narrative?
A modern-day cryptographic and archaeological thriller.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
The story traces the collision of which three types of people?
A brilliant but reclusive archivist, the unsuspecting heir to a historical secret, and a powerful, clandestine society.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What single artifact catalyzed the entire conflict?
The personal diary of the poet-historian Ishwar Ved.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Dr. Aryan Ved's full name?
Dr. Aryan Sameer Ved.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
How old is Aryan Ved?
33 years old.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Aryan Ved's date of birth?
April 12th, 1991.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Aryan's profession?
Chief Cryptographer & Lead Manuscript Conservator at the National Archives of Suryanagar (NAS).<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Aryan's official designation ID?
NAS-CRY-07-AV.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
In which ancient scripts is Aryan a specialist?
Brahmi and Kharosthi scripts.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the residential address of Dr. Aryan Ved?
Flat No. 1101, 'B' Wing, "The Zenith" Towers, Sahyadri Enclave, Suryanagar, Maharashtra - 411052.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
In which wing of "The Zenith" Towers does Aryan live?
'B' Wing.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Aryan's official email address?
aryan.ved@nas-gov.in.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Aryan's personal email address?
ved.aryan91@email.com.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Aryan's mobile number?
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Where did Aryan complete his B.A. in Ancient Indian History?
St. Xavier's College, Mumbai.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Where did Aryan complete his M.A. in Archaeology?
Deccan College Post-Graduate and Research Institute, Pune.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Where did Aryan earn his Ph.D. in Paleo-Cryptography?
The School of Oriental and African Studies (SOAS), University of London.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was the title of Aryan's doctoral thesis?
"Symbolic Encryption in Gandharan Commerce Edicts."<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Aryan's role described as in the story?
The intellectual engine.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What personal tragedy shaped Aryan's life?
The disappearance of his parents at age 14.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What were the names of Aryan's parents?
Dr. Sameer and Dr. Rina Ved.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was the profession of Aryan's parents?
They were both renowned field archaeologists.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Where did Aryan's parents vanish?
Near the Barabar Caves in Bihar.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What were his parents investigating when they disappeared?
Rumors of a lost Mauryan library.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was the official conclusion of the investigation into his parents' disappearance?
"Accidental death by misadventure."<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was the case file number for the disappearance of Sameer and Rina Ved?
Case #734-VAN-BIH.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Why is Aryan obsessed with historical truth?
Because of his parents' unresolved disappearance and his belief that their work was sabotaged.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Is Aryan a drinker?
No, he is a teetotaler.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Aryan's preferred type of tea?
Single-origin Darjeeling tea.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Which specific flush and estate of Darjeeling tea does Aryan prefer?
The First Flush from the Makaibari Estate.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Meera Prasad's full name?
Meera Devika Prasad.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
How old is Meera Prasad?
29 years old.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Meera's date of birth?
September 3rd, 1995.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Meera's profession?
Architectural Photographer & Urban Explorer.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the handle of Meera's Instagram account and blog?
@CityOfStories.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Meera's residential address?
"Pushpanjali," House No. 7, Old Silk Merchant's Lane, Qila Ghat District, Suryanagar, Maharashtra - 411011.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the name of Meera's ancestral home?
"Pushpanjali."<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Meera's mobile number?
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Meera's email address?
meera.prasad.photo@email.com.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Who is Meera's great-grandfather?
The poet-historian Ishwar Ved.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was Meera's grandmother's name?
Kavita Prasad (nÃ©e Ved).<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
When did Meera's grandmother pass away?
August 1st, 2024.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was Meera unaware of regarding her great-grandfather's role?
She was unaware of his role as a "Rakshak" (Guardian).<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was Meera's initial motivation in the story?
To protect her inheritance from what she perceived as institutional overreach by Aryan and the NAS.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What remarkable mental skill does Meera possess?
An eidetic memory for patterns and symbols.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Meera's key physical characteristic?
A faint, crescent-shaped scar above her right eyebrow.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
How did Meera get her scar?
From a childhood fall at her ancestral home, "Pushpanjali."<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the antagonist's full name?
Arjun Pratap Rathod.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
How old is Arjun Rathod?
60 years old.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Arjun Rathod's date of birth?
January 26th, 1964.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Arjun's public persona?
A revered industrialist, philanthropist, and Chairman of the "Rathod Group of Industries."<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the address of Arjun Rathod's corporate headquarters?
Rathod House, 32nd Floor, Infinity Plaza, Bandra-Kurla Complex, Suryanagar - 411051.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Arjun's true affiliation?
He is the current "Pramukh" (Chief) of the Sanghamitra Society.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
How does Arjun Rathod have privileged access to the National Archives of Suryanagar?
He is a major donor.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the Sanghamitra Society?
A secretive and ultra-nationalist organization.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Who was Arjun Rathod's grandfather?
Jagmal Rathod.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was Jagmal Rathod's relationship to Ishwar Ved?
He was a wealthy zamindar and a rival historian to Ishwar Ved in the 1940s.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was the core philosophical difference between Jagmal Rathod and Ishwar Ved?
Jagmal believed the Ashoka manuscripts were a tool for power, while Ishwar believed they must be preserved for all.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Why does Arjun Rathod want the manuscripts?
He genuinely believes he is the rightful heir to Ashoka's legacy and that controlling this knowledge is his patriotic duty to ensure India's glory.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
How does Arjun Rathod view Aryan and Meera?
As sentimental fools standing in the way of national glory.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What are the dimensions of Ishwar Ved's diary?
24cm (height) x 18cm (width) x 4cm (thickness).<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What material is the diary bound in?
Dark crimson goatskin leather.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What symbol is blind-embossed on the front cover of the diary?
A complex mandala symbol representing the Dharma wheel, with a lotus at its center.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
How many pages does the diary contain?
180 pages.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
The diary's paper comes from which region?
The Sanganer region of Rajasthan.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What kind of watermark is found in the diary?
A small, almost invisible watermark of a Banyan leaf.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
How frequently does the Banyan leaf watermark appear?
On the bottom-right corner of every 10th page.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
In which languages and scripts is the diary written?
A mix of Hindi (Devanagari script) and English.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What years does the diary cover?
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the first layer of security in the diary called?
A Steganographic Code.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
How does the Steganographic Code work?
Specific words in poems are marked with a minuscule dot of a different ink pigment.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is special about the ink used for the code?
It is a custom-made iron gall ink with a higher copper sulfate concentration.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
How can the coded ink markings be detected?
Only under ultraviolet light.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What are the dimensions of the Navagraha Compass?
It is a palm-sized, circular brass object, 7cm in diameter.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the precise weight of the Navagraha Compass?
157 grams.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Is the Navagraha Compass a magnetic compass?
No, it is not.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the faceplate of the compass made of?
A disc of polished obsidian.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is inset around the edge of the compass instead of cardinal directions?
Nine small, polished gemstones representing the Navagraha.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Which gemstone on the compass represents the Sun?
Ruby.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Which gemstone represents Saturn?
Blue Sapphire.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Which gemstone represents Mars?
Red Coral.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the primary function of the Navagraha Compass?
It is the decryption key for the text string extracted from the diary.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What type of cipher device does the compass function as?
A Polybius Square Cipher device.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
How is the long text string from the diary used with the compass?
It is broken into pairs of letters.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
In the compass cipher, what does the first letter of a pair correspond to?
One of the nine gemstones (planets).<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
In the compass cipher, what does the second letter of a pair correspond to?
One of 12 zodiac signs etched on the obsidian face.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Where was the Navagraha Compass hidden?
Inside a hollowed-out copy of a book.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was the title of the book the compass was hidden in?
"The Discovery of India" by Jawaharlal Nehru.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Which edition of the book was used to hide the compass?
The First Edition, 1946.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
In which library was this book located?
The Suryanagar Heritage Institute library.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was the library call number for the book containing the compass?
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
How did Aryan discover the location of the compass?
By cross-referencing Ishwar Ved's library checkout records from 1947.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the full name of the "Guardian" society?
The Itihas Rakshak Mandal (The Guardians of History Society).<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
When was the Itihas Rakshak Mandal founded?
Circa 1858, after the Indian Rebellion of 1857.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Who founded the Rakshak Mandal?
A consortium of Indian scholars, mystics, and disenfranchised nobles.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was the founding purpose of the Rakshak Mandal?
To protect Indian historical artifacts and knowledge from the British colonial administration.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the core philosophy of the Rakshak Mandal?
Knowledge is a universal heritage that belongs to all humanity.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the creed of the Rakshak Mandal?
Preservation, not Possession.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the structure of the Rakshak Mandal?
A decentralized network of "Guardians" in small, independent cells.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Who was the Guardian of the Suryanagar cell in the 1940s?
Ishwar Ved.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the identifying mark of a Rakshak Mandal member?
They traditionally carry a small, personal object made of Sandalwood.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was Ishwar Ved's chosen sandalwood object?
The sandalwood chest in which he hid the diary.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the name of the rival secret society?
The Sanghamitra Society.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
When was the Sanghamitra Society officially established?
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Who founded the Sanghamitra Society?
Keshav Rathod, the great-grandfather of Arjun Rathod.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the philosophy of the Sanghamitra Society?
A philosophy of Destiny and Dominion.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
How does the Sanghamitra Society view the Ashoka manuscripts?
As a national treasure and a "Brahmastra" of knowledge to propel India to global supremacy.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
How does the Sanghamitra Society view the Rakshak Mandal's goal of preservation?
As a weakness and a betrayal of national potential.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the structure of the Sanghamitra Society?
A rigid, hierarchical organization led by the "Pramukh."<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What are the department heads below the Pramukh called?
"VibhagPatis."<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the identifying mark of high-ranking Sanghamitra Society members?
A signet ring made of Panchaloha.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What are the five metals that make up Panchaloha?
Gold, silver, copper, iron, and zinc.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What symbol is engraved on the Sanghamitra signet ring?
The Mauryan symbol of a peacock under a hill.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Who is believed to have compiled the original research notes for the cache?
Chanakya (Kautilya).<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Who curated the final collection of the manuscripts?
Radhagupta, the chief minister to Emperor Ashoka.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
How many scrolls are believed to be in the cache?
72 scrolls.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What materials are the scrolls made of?
Specially treated palm leaves and thin copper sheets.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the first section of the cache's contents called?
Artha Vigyan (Material Sciences).<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What does the Artha Vigyan section contain?
Treatises on metallurgy, architecture, and pharmacology, including formulas for rust-proof alloys and herbal anesthetics.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the second section of the cache's contents called?
Rajniti Shastra (Statecraft & Espionage).<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What does the Rajniti Shastra section contain?
An unredacted addendum to the Arthashastra, with guides to psychological warfare and intelligence networks.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the third and most controversial section called?
Manas Chakra (The Mind's Wheel).<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What does the Manas Chakra section contain?
Writings on mass psychology, behavioral conditioning, and powerful mnemonic techniques.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Which section of the cache does the Sanghamitra Society covet the most?
Manas Chakra.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the container for the scrolls called?
A large, lead-lined coffer.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What type of wood is the coffer made from?
Teak wood.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
How is the coffer sealed?
With a complex mechanical lock requiring a final numerical key.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the address of the National Archives of Suryanagar (NAS)?
1, Samvidhan Circle, Government Sector 5, Suryanagar, Maharashtra - 411003.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the room number of Aryan's office at the NAS?
Room #218.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
In which wing is Aryan's office located?
The secure Manuscript Restoration Wing (MRW).<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is required to access the Manuscript Restoration Wing?
A Level-4 security clearance card and a biometric palm scan.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Where at the NAS was the diary stored?
In Secure Document Vault #7.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was the vault access code during the week of the attempted theft?
808-DELTA-42.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
In which district is Meera's home located?
The Qila Ghat District (Old City).<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the name of the river that flows through the Qila Ghat District?
The fictional Mutha River.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Where was the secret cellar in "Pushpanjali" located?
Accessed via a loose flagstone beneath the spice rack in the pantry.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What were the secret meetings held in the cellar of "Pushpanjali"?
Ishwar Ved used to conduct his Rakshak Mandal meetings there.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the name of the ancient bookstore in Qila Ghat?
"Deewan-e-Khaas" Bookshop.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the address of the "Deewan-e-Khaas" Bookshop?
Shop #14, Moti Bazaar, within Qila Ghat.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Who runs the "Deewan-e-Khaas" Bookshop?
Mr. Ibrahim.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What crucial item does Mr. Ibrahim provide to Aryan and Meera?
Crucial historical maps of Suryanagar that are no longer in public circulation.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is Arjun Rathod's desk made from?
A single block of Italian marble.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Where is the Sanghamitra Society's real nerve center located?
In the sub-basement of the OmniCorp Global building.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the address of the OmniCorp Global building?
1 Cyber Gateway, Hinjewadi, Suryanagar - 411057.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What is the codename for the server the Sanghamitra Society uses to brute-force the diary's codes?
"PROJECT CHANAKYA."<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
On what date did Meera's grandmother, Kavita Prasad, pass away?
August 1st, 2024.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
On what date did Meera move into "Pushpanjali"?
September 15th, 2024.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
On what date and at what time did Meera discover Ishwar Ved's diary?
September 20th, 2024, at 11:30 AM.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Where exactly did Meera find the diary?
Inside a false bottom of a large sandalwood chest in her great-grandfather's study.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
When did Meera first contact the National Archives of Suryanagar?
September 22nd, 2024.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was the request ticket number for Meera's query to the NAS?
#NAS-CONSULT-24-9982.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Why was Meera's query assigned to Dr. Aryan Ved?
Because its specific nature matched his expertise, and he shared the same last name.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
On what date and time did Aryan and Meera have their first meeting?
September 25th, 2024, at 4:00 PM.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Where did Aryan and Meera's first meeting take place?
In Aryan's office, Room #218 at the NAS.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What technology did Aryan use to confirm the steganographic code?
A multispectral imager.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was the evidence item number assigned to the diary?
Evidence Item #77B.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
When was Arjun Rathod alerted to the diary's existence?
September 28th, 2024.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
How was Arjun Rathod alerted?
By a high-level informant within the NAS acquisitions department.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was the coded message sent to Rathod by his informant?
"The crimson book has found its reader."<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
On what date did Aryan successfully isolate the cipher-text from the diary?
October 5th, 2024.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
How many characters long was the cipher-text string?
1,200 characters.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
When did Aryan find Ishwar Ved's old library checkout records?
October 9th, 2024.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was unusual about the checkout record for "The Discovery of India"?
It was checked out for an unusually long period and returned with a note about "minor binding damage."<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
On what date and time did Aryan retrieve the Navagraha Compass?
October 10th, 2024, at 2:15 PM.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
During which dates did Aryan and Meera work together to decipher the text?
October 12th - 20th, 2024.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Whose skill helped them quickly master the compass mechanism?
Meera's keen eye for patterns.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
On what night did the attempted infiltration of the NAS occur?
The night of October 21st, 2024.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
Which security firm attempted the infiltration?
"Aegis Tactical," Rathod's private security firm.<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was the public code used to bypass the NAS main gate?
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What security measure stopped the infiltration team?
The biometric security of the MRW (Manuscript Restoration Wing).<|end|>
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
What was the official incident report number for the break-in attempt?
You answer questions about the story 'Suryanagar Cipher'
